data_findings.finding: Best pre-optimized score is 70.676102. Target is 68.919154. Gap is 1.75 points (2.5%). The pre-optimized submissions are at a tight local optimum - standard SA/optimization runs find NO improvements.

bbox3.cpp is the core optimizer: Uses Complex Number Vector Coordination, Fluid Dynamics simulation, Hinge Pivot mechanism, Density Gradient Flow, Global Boundary Tension. Key params: -n iterations (5000-20000), -r rounds (16-256). Compile: g++ -O3 -march=native -std=c++17 -fopenmp -o bbox3 bbox3.cpp
tree_packer_v21.cpp: Alternative optimizer with swap moves, multi-angle restarts, higher temperature SA, squeeze/compaction/local search phases. Uses long double precision.

fix_direction post-processing: Rotates entire configuration to minimize bounding box. Uses ConvexHull + minimize_scalar to find optimal rotation angle (0-90 degrees). Can improve score without changing tree positions relative to each other.
